评论详情: I bought these for my transgender wife to wear out in public to cover her Adam's apple. The size and shape is perfect for that. I will alsl offer that these are beautiful as can be. They are elegant, comfortable, gothic, and versatile. There is a wide variety and it is a large assortment. But, 6 of 9 broke on the first wear. Another broke after the second wear, and the last two I had to fix over and over while on a date. I feel like for the price, they are good investment if you don't mind running to Michael's or hobby lobby and grabbing some jewelry chain to replace the backs.
